text: This video will show you
how to get free items on Roblox.
The first way to get Roblox items
is by participating in Roblox events.
These events are often to promote a brand,
musical artist, or upcoming film
and offer free items for your avatar.
To find the latest Roblox events,

look in the left side bar
on the Roblox website.
On each event game page, you'll see badges

which correspond to the
different hats available.
By playing the game

and completing in-game
quests or challenges,
you will unlock the items.
The next way to get free Roblox items
is by browsing the avatar shop.

Click on the avatar shop
on the Roblox website,
then select "View All Items."
Click on "Roblox" under the creators tab,
then select the relevance button
and choose "Price (Low to High)."
This will list Roblox-created items
which are free at the top.

As you can see, there
are many different items
which you can get.
To find a specific type of item,

simply select the item
type in the left menu.
To find free faces on Roblox,
click to expand on the body parts category
and select "Faces."

Make sure you've selected
"Price (Low to High)"
instead of "Relevance"
so that only free faces are shown first.
As you can see,
there are many different faces available
to add to your Roblox inventory.
Click a face to head to its page,
where you can then purchase it for free.
